definitions.text: something having the property of being analogous to something else
an imaginary line around the Earth parallel to the equator
(mathematics) one of a set of parallel geometric figures (parallel lines or planes)

examples: Their roles are paralleled by ours

definitions.text: make or place parallel to something
examples: They paralleled the ditch to the highway
The polished surface twinned his face and chest in reverse

definitions.text: being everywhere equidistant and not intersecting
of or relating to the simultaneous performance of multiple operations
